sub_title: Scientist CNS Disease Biology at uniQure
summary:
I am eager to share knowledge and experience, thrive in a team and want to make an impact. I always strive to improve and learn, like structure and efficiency, and reliability and loyalty are two of my key assets. Furthermore, I thoroughly enjoy teaching and supervising students, as well as coaching volleybal teams and new referees. I am convinced that team play is one of the most important factors for success.

I am currently working as a Scientist Adult Neurology at uniQure, where we strive to deliver transformative gene therapies for patients with high unmet medical needs.
